amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand the eligibility of the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality Improvement (CMAQ) program to include innovative shared use mobility projects that can reduce congestion and improve air quality and sought to expand associated transit improvements to include those shared-use projects that directly enhance transit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to expand the eligibility of the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality Improvement (CMAQ) program to include innovative shared use mobility projects that can reduce congestion and improve air quality. Expands associated transit improvements to include those shared-use projects that directly enhance transit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 586).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 586).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
